title: Opensea SignTypedData Error

body:
Previous discussion: https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/25355 , also https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26781. 

Some TLDR;

> If we show it to the user, it must be part of the signed data.
> If you want to not have it part of the signed data, it must be stripped from the displayed data too.
> ... 
> Feel free to open another PR to address the problem the other way round, so that we maintain "what you see is what you sign" by hiding/removing anything that is not part of what is signed.
